Package org.eclipse.gef.cloudio.internal.ui.view

Class CloudOptionsComposite

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
org.eclipse.gef.cloudio.internal.ui.view.CloudOptionsComposite
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class CloudOptionsComposite extends Composite
Provides options to modify the rendering of a TagCloudViewer using an IEditableCloudLabelProvider.
